The data being used is from the [ZICTA website](http://onlinesystems.zicta.zm:8585/statsfinal/ICT%20Indicators.html)

## Prerequisites

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse) # We are going got use the dyplr, ggplot2 packages
```

## load the data
```{r,message=FALSE}
operator_stats <- read_csv(file = "~/R/asimumba/content/data/operator_stats.csv")
```

```{r}
head(operator_stats) #Take peek at the data.
```
```{r}
names(operator_stats) # column names 
```
#Number of registered simcards and active users 
```{r}
operator_stats %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  geom_line(mapping =aes(x = Year,y = Number_of_active_Subscribers), color = "green") 
  # geom_line(aes(x = Year,y = Number_of_Registered_SIM_Cards), color = "")
```


## Domestic calls Traffic - Incoming and Outgoing 
```{r}
operator_stats %>% 
ggplot() +
  geom_line(aes(x = Year,y = Traffic_domestic_Incoming_Minutes_MNO_PSTN ), color = "red") +
  geom_line(aes(x = Year, y = Traffic_domestic_Outgoing_Minutes_MNO_PSTN), color = "green")
```
